name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning
display_help: You can command the forces of nature! Storm Summoning allows you to control wind and weather to aid your allies and wreak havoc on your foes.

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Gale
powers.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 80° arc (16 targets max)

display_info: 10.4 magnitude knock on target after 1s delay
10.4 magnitude knock on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.O2_Boost
powers.display_help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing their wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects as well as increase perception. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 86.50% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 1m 0s on target
173.00% resistance to sleep for 1m 0s on target
108.12% resistance to perception radius debuff for 1m 0s on target
-8.6 stun protection, sleep protection for 1m 0s on target
86.50% resistance to stun, sleep for 1m 0s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Snow_Storm
powers.display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -62.50% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 0.75s on target
-62.50% strength to jump height, recharge for 0.75s on target
-350.00% max run speed for 0.75s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Steamy_Mist
powers.display_help: Your mastery of the elements allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within a Steamy Mist. Steamy Mist makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense bonus to all attacks, while reducing Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as your Foes ability to Confuse you. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF(All), +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Confuse)

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 5.00% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 2.25s on target
20.00% resistance to fire damage, cold damage, energy damage for 2.25s on target
216.25% resistance to confuse for 2.25s on target
302.75% resistance to confuse for 2.25s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Fog
powers.display_help: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Hurricane
powers.display_help: You can summon a Hurricane. The wind and rain from this massive storm reduce the range and chance to hit of nearby foes. The massive winds of this storm continuously force foes away from you. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Foe -Range, -To Hit, Repel, Knockback

display_info: -60.00% strength to range for 10s on target
5.00% chance for 8.3 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Thunder_Clap
powers.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Thunder Clap that will Disorient most foes in a large area around you. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Tornado
powers.display_help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Storm_Summoning.Lightning_Storm
powers.display_help: You can create a massive Lightning Storm that will strike any foe that approaches you. Lightning from this storm can knock down and damage all nearby foes, and can even instill panic. Lightning bolts will continue to fall as long as the storm remains. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Create Storm: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe -End
